item.title: Mermaid Test
item.author: QiMington
item.description: flowchart TB A[Start] --> B{Decision} B -->|Yes| C[Continue] B -->|No| D[Stop] erDiagram CUSTOMER }|..|{ DELIVERY-ADDRESS : has CUSTOMER ||--o{ ORDER : places CUSTOMER ||--o{ INVOICE : "liable for" DELIVERY-ADDRESS ||--o{ ORDER : receives INVOICE ||--|{ ORDER : covers ORDER ||--|{ ORDER-ITEM : includes PRODUCT-CATEGORY ||--|{ PRODUCT : contains PRODUCT ||--o{ ORDER-ITEM : "ordered in" graph TD A([开始]) --> B[用户访问注册页面] B --> C{用户已注册？} C --> |是| D[用户输入登录信息] C --> |否| E[用户填写注册信息] E --> F[系统验证注册信息] F --> G{信息合法？} G --> |是| H[注册成功，跳转登录页面] G --> |否| I[注册失败，提示错误信息] H & I --> J([结束]) D --> K[系统验证登录信息] K --> |正确| J K --> |错误| I
